original_title: In Gefahr und größter Not bringt der Mittelweg den Tod
overview: Combining fictional and documentary modes, Kluge's In Danger and Dire Distress... takes a critical stance toward Frankfurt's public sphere and urban redevelopment. Despite the serious formal and political concerns of the film, Kluge's heightened sense of the absurd safeguards a reserve of utopian optimism.
title: In Danger and Dire Distress the Middle of the Road Leads to Death
